name: QuoteGPT
shortDescription: A quote generator utilizing the OpenAI API
description: This application uses the React framework and the OpenAI API to generate distinctive quotes based on different author types selected by the user. The user interface offers a dropdown menu featuring categories like "Ancient Philosopher," "Scientist," "Musician," and a flexible "Custom" option.

name: Precipitimer
shortDescription: This website counts down to the next precipitation event based on your location.
description: Precipitimer is a weather-focused web application built with HTML, CSS, and JS. It uses the VC Weather API to provide real-time weather updates and predicts the next precipitation event based on the user's location. The primary aim of this project was to create a reliable tool for weather-sensitive activities.

name: Waterfowl Abyss
description: Waterfowl Abyss is a 2D platformer game, developed in Unity using C# for a Game Jam. The game features procedurally generated levels, ensuring a unique experience every time you play. The main objective is to navigate through the abyss while avoiding various obstacles.

name: Spellbound
shortDescription: Skill based platformer where you play as a wizards spell book.
description: Spellbound is a unique, skill-based platformer where the player assumes the role of a wizard's spellbook. Created in Unity using C#, the game was developed for a Game Jam. The core mechanic is using the different spells available in the book to overcome various challenges and obstacles.

name: Rimor
shortDescription: Momentum based platformer with a grappling hook.
description: Rimor is a momentum-based 2D platformer game built with Unity and C#. It's designed around a unique grappling hook mechanic, requiring players to maintain momentum and traverse through the levels. Rimor was created for a Game Jam, showcasing the potential of physics in platformer games.

name: Snowball Fight VR
description: Snowball Fight VR is a virtual reality game developed in Unity using C# and the XR Interaction Toolkit. The game was developed as part of the Holiday VR Jam 2020. It involves the player engaging in a snowball fight against snowmen and building forts for protection. It offers an immersive winter holiday experience.

name: Phaser
description: Phaser is a 3D parkour game with a twist. Built in Unity using C#, the game was developed for a Game Jam. It introduces a unique dimension-shifting mechanic where players must adjust their reality to navigate through the level, providing an innovative take on the parkour genre.

name: Smart Dots
description: Smart Dots is a maze-solving application built in Java using Processing and the principles of evolutionary computation. The application uses genetic algorithms to evolve a population of 'dots' that learn to navigate through a series of increasingly complex mazes.

name: Mandelbrot Explorer
description: Mandelbrot Explorer is a visualization tool built in Java using Processing. It allows users to explore the intricate patterns of the Mandelbrot set, a complex mathematical object. This project was designed to demonstrate the power and beauty of fractals.
